## Playbook Standards Checklist

### Content Quality
- [ ] Clear and concise writing
- [ ] No typos or grammatical errors
- [ ] Consistent terminology (uses [Ubiquitous Language](../2-standards/development-system.md#ubiquitous-language))
- [ ] Examples provided where helpful
- [ ] Links to related sections are accurate

### Alignment with OneSyntax Values
- [ ] Supports our mission of [true partnership](../1-mission/why-we-exist.md)
- [ ] Aligned with [OneSyntax values](../1-mission/our-values.md)
- [ ] Maintains professional tone
- [ ] Practical and actionable

### Technical Accuracy
- [ ] Code examples are correct and follow [development standards](../2-standards/development-system.md)
- [ ] Architecture guidance aligns with [Clean Architecture principles](../reference/architecture-guide.md)
- [ ] No security vulnerabilities in examples
- [ ] Best practices are current and industry-standard

### Structure & Navigation
- [ ] Follows playbook structure conventions
- [ ] Table of contents updated (if applicable)
- [ ] Cross-references added where relevant
- [ ] File naming follows conventions

## Testing
<!-- How did you verify these changes? -->

- [ ] Tested all links (no broken links)
- [ ] Reviewed in markdown preview
- [ ] Checked on mobile/different screen sizes (if applicable)
- [ ] Spell-checked

- [ ] No duplicate information
- [ ] Tone is consistent with existing content
